programme.title: Nur Gott kann mich richten
Nur Gott kann mich richten
programme.desc: Nur Gott kann mich richten: Directed by Özgür Yildirim. With Neil Malik Abdullah, Kai Ivo Baulitz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Zejhun Demirov. After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, and Ricky could use the money to set up his new life. Ricky hesitates at first but then agrees. Complications arise as soon as some preparations start. Things kept going out in awry, especially as a form of hardup policewoman Diana." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6175764/","name":"Nur Gott kann mich richten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjExZjMyMTItNWVjYy00M2U4LTllZTAtYzQwNDdkZmVkNDBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA3Njg4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6175764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"And the reviewers can too","reviewBody":"So it will be up to us to give this the thumbs up or down treatment. As you can see clearly I'm giving this two thumbs up. And while I'm not comparing it directly too, I personally felt this could be a companion piece to a 90s movie called "Kurz und Schmerzlos" by Fatih Akin.\n\nThere are certain elements that you can compare I reckon - like three male main characters. The fact that there is criminal lifestyles involved ... but there are also quite a few things that are different. Way different. Still I really like both movies and this has the great Moritz Bleibtreu in it. He can walk that thin line between raging mad, but also likeable and reletable ... you do root for him - maybe not all the time, but you can dig what he tries to do and where his intentions lie. You can also understand everyone elses motivation ... even when they clash with each other ... very well done! A genre piece with great acting and a really strong, grim, dark and gritty story ...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1973,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-01-25","keywords":"frankfurt germany,botched robbery,jail,revenge,strong female character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918510873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2494529/","name":"Neil Malik Abdullah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062049/","name":"Kai Ivo Baulitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001953/","name":"Moritz Bleibtreu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0612398/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
Gesetz der Rache
programme.desc: Law Abiding Citizen: Directed by F. Gary Gray. With Jamie Foxx, Gerard Butler, Colm Meaney, Bruce McGill. A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1197624/","name":"Law Abiding Citizen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQ1NmZlNDktZTg0NS00ZjNhLTk5M2QtNzExNjUzY2MwMjliXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1197624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"writefan"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Law Abiding Citizen is a thrill ride","reviewBody":"This film is gory, but the gore is mostly suggested rather than shown. You can make up your own mind as to how gory you want it to be. Clyde Shelton (Gerard Butler) and Nick Rice (Jamie Foxx) are excellent as "frenemies." They still sympathize with each other, in a way, as each teaches the other a lesson. Butler is excellent as the crushed father and husband who believes he must use his unique skills and talent to make an example of a justice system that has forgotten the victims. You sympathize with him even as he enacts his vicious lesson plan upon Foxx's coworkers. Foxx is an arrogant self-serving assistant district attorney who is only concerned with his conviction rate as he claws his way up the ladder in the justice system. He has forgotten the victims. But when he has a family of his own, he begins to see Clyde's point, yet he cannot give in to all of Clyde's demands to stop the carnage. Beautifully films in a noir tone with excellent timing on the stunts and effects. Law Abiding Citizen is an adrenaline-pumping experience. Bring your heart meds.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":286803,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-10-16","keywords":"justice,terrorism,rape and revenge,deal,investigation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Law Abiding Citizen: "Don't Even Twitch"","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1598816793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2MDQ2MTEzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk2ODA5Mg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2MDQ2MTEzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzk2ODA5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from the movie Law Abiding Citizen."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004937/","name":"Jamie Foxx"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004753/","name":"Leslie Bibb"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0336620/","name":"F. Gary Gray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0332840/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0187451/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125213/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chaos
Chaos
programme.desc: Chaos: Directed by Tony Giglio. With Jason Statham, Ryan Phillippe, Wesley Snipes, Henry Czerny. Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0402910/","name":"Chaos","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NDU0MTgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgwMzY4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0402910/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DxB_PiRaTe"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Cast......Good movie!","reviewBody":"I went to this movie with the lowest expectations and i just thought i would see a van dammed type of movie. But I was in for a surprise. The movie has good twists and action, I really loved the acting from Jasom Statham who is a really good actor! If you are an action movies fan then you shouldn't miss this movie... and don't think this movie is an all action movie, the story is well written and the twists are well made. I'd say go for it if you don't know which movie to watch!\n\nThe movie starts with Jason Statham out of the force. So then they had to get him back because of a bank robbery and the bad guys asked for him. Something bad happens in the Bank, then the cops are after the bad guys looking for them. You will have to keep a close eye at the movie, it's a good action thriller that you will not expect to be as good as it is!! and after this movie i'll proudly say i'm a huge fan of Jason Statham (Snatch, Lock Stock and two Smoking Barrels, Transporter, Transporter 2, Cellular, CHAOS), this guy is just amazing!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":53949,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-08","keywords":"chaos theory,power outage,investigation,exploding house,hanging upside down","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000202/","name":"Ryan Phillippe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000648/","name":"Wesley Snipes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317638/","name":"Tony Giglio"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125996/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0313720/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0313752/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317638/","name":"Tony Giglio"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Those Who Wish Me Dead
They Want Me Dead
programme.desc:
Those Who Wish Me Dead: Directed by Taylor Sheridan. With Angelina Jolie, Finn Little, Jon Bernthal, Aidan Gillen. A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3215824/","name":"Those Who Wish Me Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDAxMmQ0NTAtNDllNC00ZjE2LTlkNjUtMmExNmY0MmNkMDQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzYyOTM1ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenage murder witness finds himself pursued by twin assassins in the Montana wilderness with a survival expert tasked with protecting him -- and a forest fire threatening to consume them all.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3215824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Movi3DO"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Average although decent thrill","reviewBody":"A brand new movie just added to HBO Max. A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

A traumatized and retired firefighter who had to protect a boy from those who wish him dead.

When I saw the trailer, I expected a pretty simple thriller. And I was right. The trailer showed most of the story. The plot was seen a bunch of times before, so there wasn't any surprises here.

The acting was pretty decent across the board. There wasn't much complex emotion or scenes that required these actors to show their best.

Even though the plot was simple, I still wanted a decent thriller, and the movie gave me that. There were some pretty okay and intense action scenes, and they were handled well.

My biggest problem was the characters. At the beginning, the movie showed the event that traumatized the main character, played by Jolie. However, I did not see the significance of this event to the story at all. It didn't impact her character when she was in the action scenes.

Besides the main character, there were minimal development to the other characters. Jon Bernthal was badass as usual, but I didn't care for his character much, or any other characters.

Overall, a decent thriller, but everything else was average and not memorable. There's no need to watch this movie. 6/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-05-06","keywords":"female protagonist,survival,wildfire,assassin,fire tower","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284292633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3YjQwMjgtNmE0Ny00ZjQyLWIwMWMtZTQxNWY4MDU1NDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While reeling from the loss of three lives she failed to save in a fire, smoke jumper Hannah comes across a traumatized 12-year-old boy with nowhere else to turn.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0396558/","name":"Nicholas Hoult","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7567974/","name":"Finn Little"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465018/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4509289/","name":"Michael Koryta","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0495378/","name":"Charles Leavitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792263/","name":"Taylor Sheridan"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: غضب الرجل
Cash Truck
programme.desc: غضب الرجل: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Rocci Williams, Josh Hartnett. The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11083552/","name":"Wrath of Man","alternateName":"غضب الرجل","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkOTlhOTktNjZiNS00NDg3LWIxMDAtZTY5Y2E0YjllN2IxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11083552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ritchie does another crime thriller","reviewBody":"In L. A., an armored truck is robbed and the two drivers are killed. Patrick Hill (Jason Statham) barely passes the tests to be the new hire at the company. When his truck gets hit, he turns into the Terminator.\n\nThis is a Guy Ritchie film. It's a mid-level action thriller. It mostly works although it insists on following the story from all sides which leaves the film at almost two hours. By grouping the different sides separately, they do feel a bit split especially the story of the robbers. I do wonder if the search for the inside man would be a more compelling path. Ritchie is trying for a tighter thriller than his usual. It's him slimmed down. He uses his action skills but this is not going to be considered one of his best or most inventive.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":133744,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-05-13","keywords":"revenge,remake,police,shootout,non linear narrative","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Get Tickets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3455041561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious and wild-eyed new cash truck security guard (Jason Statham) surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman's ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564697/","name":"Holt McCallany"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0719257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0099398/","name":"Nicolas Boukhrief"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078704/","name":"Éric Besnard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11083552/","name":"Wrath of Man","alternateName":"غضب الرجل","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkOTlhOTktNjZiNS00NDg3LWIxMDAtZTY5Y2E0YjllN2IxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The plot follows H, a cold and mysterious character working at a cash truck company responsible for moving hundreds of millions of dollars around Los Angeles each week.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11083552/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle","dateCreated":"2021-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ritchie does another crime thriller","reviewBody":"In L. A., an armored truck is robbed and the two drivers are killed. Patrick Hill (Jason Statham) barely passes the tests to be the new hire at the company. When his truck gets hit, he turns into the Terminator.\n\nThis is a Guy Ritchie film. It's a mid-level action thriller. It mostly works although it insists on following the story from all sides which leaves the film at almost two hours. By grouping the different sides separately, they do feel a bit split especially the story of the robbers. I do wonder if the search for the inside man would be a more compelling path. Ritchie is trying for a tighter thriller than his usual. It's him slimmed down. He uses his action skills but this is not going to be considered one of his best or most inventive.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":133744,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-05-13","keywords":"revenge,remake,police,shootout,non linear narrative","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Get Tickets","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3455041561","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQ3Y2Q3N2YtNzMzNy00YWI1LTllMjgtMWViZWM4NTk4ODllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious and wild-eyed new cash truck security guard (Jason Statham) surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. Absolution: Directed by Keoni Waxman. With Steven Seagal, Byron Mann, Howard Dell, Adina Stetcu. Contract killer John Alexander (Steven Seagal, "Under Siege") has a chance to save an innocent girl from a powerful mob boss, but protecting her means betraying the government agency that hired him and putting his own life at risk." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3503840/","name":"Absolution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NjY0NzYzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM2MzI4NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Contract killer John Alexander (Steven Seagal, "Under Siege") has a chance to save an innocent girl from a powerful mob boss, but protecting her means betraying the government agency that hired him and putting his own life at risk.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3503840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sonofjorel316"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A return to form for Seagal?","reviewBody":"Without any spoilers as a direct to DVD film this is one of Seagal better efforts. Please don't listen to the critic's Technically it's a well executed film. Seagal and Mann make a great team together and whilst Vinnie Jones is not in the film a great deal he's a very believable bad guy because quite frankly playing psychos is what Vinnie does best.

I rated It an 8 as an action film because the story and pace and action kept me entertained. 

I do recommend this to fans of Seagal.

Please view for yourself and decide.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3368,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Crime"],"datePublished":"2015-05-15","keywords":"time bomb,ukraine,weapon,nightclub shootout,car","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Absolution","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2094774809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTk1NzkwNjktMTNjYy00YjI3LWJkNDUtZjM3NTZkMzRkYzQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTk1NzkwNjktMTNjYy00YjI3LWJkNDUtZjM3NTZkMzRkYzQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Absolution"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000219/","name":"Steven Seagal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542677/","name":"Byron Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0217320/","name":"Howard Dell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915394/","name":"Keoni Waxman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0507691/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020879/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064174/","name":"Richard Beattie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915394/","name":"Keoni Waxman"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Way Back
Out Of Play – Der Weg zurück
programme.desc:
The Way Back: Directed by Gavin O'Connor. With Ben Affleck, Al Madrigal, Janina Gavankar, Michaela Watkins. Jack Cunningham was a high school basketball phenom who walked away from the game, forfeiting his future. Years later, when he reluctantly accepts a coaching job at his alma mater, he may get one last shot at redemption." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8544498/","name":"The Way Back","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjBjMTgyYzktN2U0Mi00YTJhLThkZDQtZmM1ZDlmNWMwZDQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Cunningham was a high school basketball phenom who walked away from the game, forfeiting his future. Years later, when he reluctantly accepts a coaching job at his alma mater, he may get one last shot at redemption.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8544498/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"keithsealy"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well acted, but predictable","reviewBody":"The dialog, acting, the characters, production value, etc. of this movie were excellent. It is a very honest representation of a man suffering with grief and alcoholism.

However, it suffers from being a retread of many other similar movies. You can trace the story arc easily and predict what will happen throughout. You also shouldn't go into this movie thinking it is a 'sports' movie, while basketball coaching serves as a vehicle of redemption, you could have written the same movie about someone taking a job teaching a class or working with special needs kids.

Finally, be warned that this is a very 'heavy' movie. There are a few lighter scenes, but >80% of the movie is dramatic and played for an emotional punch.

Worth a watch for Affeck's performance.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41173,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"2020-03-06","keywords":"alcoholism,basketball movie,basketball coach,cemetery,underdog","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2639839001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWIzYmVkY2QtNTZlMy00MzE4LWE3NDktZWEzMGE2MjZmZmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWIzYmVkY2QtNTZlMy00MzE4LWE3NDktZWEzMGE2MjZmZmU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jack Cunningham (Ben Affleck) once had a life filled with promise. In high school, he was a basketball phenom with a full university scholarship, when suddenly, for reasons unknown, he walked away from the game, forfeiting his future. Now years later, Jack is spiralling down, triggered by an unspeakable loss, and drowning in the alcoholism that cost him his marriage and any hope for a better life. When he is asked to coach the basketball team at his alma mater, which has fallen far since his glory days, he reluctantly accepts, surprising no one more than himself. As the boys start to come together as a team and win, Jack may have finally found a reason to confront the demons that have derailed him. But will it be enough to fill the void, heal the deep wounds of his past, and set him on the road to redemption?"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1371339/","name":"Al Madrigal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1232470/","name":"Janina Gavankar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0640334/","name":"Gavin O'Connor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0706942/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2145487/","name":"Brad Ingelsby"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: All Eyez on Me
All Eyez on me
programme.desc:
All Eyez on Me: Directed by Benny Boom. With Demetrius Shipp Jr., Danai Gurira, Kat Graham, Hill Harper. Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1666185/","name":"All Eyez on Me","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NzQ4NzU4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTkxMzE0MjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1666185/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"buzzbuzz-86263"},"dateCreated":"2017-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Incredibly disappointing","reviewBody":"This movie was hyped to be a wonderfully poignant look at an epic entertainer who made his mark on the world. It is extremely disappointing. With the exception of Tupac's mother, there is very little character development. Scenes are very rushed and end up seeming random, incomplete and not well interconnected. The movie jumps all over the place without developing the story line well. There are a load of "era" errors -- cars, cell phones, brands, etc... that weren't even around when Tupac was, but are all over in the film. This was just generally a horrible fail of a movie.

I was holding out a great deal of hope and left feeling like my 11 years old could have told the story better - by simply reading a book about Tupac.

This movie is a downright disgrace. There were so many ways it could have been better. It is shameful that this was even released. I really was hoping and expecting to at least be entertained. This movie just completely misses the mark.

It is a waste of time to view this movie. You will never get that time back. Just don't do it. Ya, it's that bad.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22533,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2017-06-16","keywords":"los angeles california,singing in a car,bikini,male objectification,female objectification","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi62109977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E2NjkyZmYtZTNlZS00ZDVhLWIzZmItY2UwN2U5ZGExMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjMwMzc3MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E2NjkyZmYtZTNlZS00ZDVhLWIzZmItY2UwN2U5ZGExMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjMwMzc3MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the life and legacy of Tupac Shakur, including his rise to superstardom as a hip hop artist, actor, poet and activist, as well as his imprisonment and prolific, controversial time at Death Row Records."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7447307/","name":"Demetrius Shipp Jr."},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1775091/","name":"Danai Gurira"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334159/","name":"Kat Graham"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1534600/","name":"Benny Boom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0346090/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353183/","name":"Jeremy Haft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0327659/","name":"Eddie Gonzalez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1691003/","name":"Steven Bagatourian"}],"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1666185/","name":"All Eyez on Me","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc5NzQ4NzU4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTkxMzE0MjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tells the true and untold story of prolific rapper, actor, poet and activist Tupac Shakur.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1666185/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"buzzbuzz-86263","dateCreated":"2017-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Incredibly disappointing","reviewBody":"This movie was hyped to be a wonderfully poignant look at an epic entertainer who made his mark on the world. It is extremely disappointing. With the exception of Tupac's mother, there is very little character development. Scenes are very rushed and end up seeming random, incomplete and not well interconnected. The movie jumps all over the place without developing the story line well. There are a load of "era" errors -- cars, cell phones, brands, etc... that weren't even around when Tupac was, but are all over in the film. This was just generally a horrible fail of a movie.

I was holding out a great deal of hope and left feeling like my 11 years old could have told the story better - by simply reading a book about Tupac.

This movie is a downright disgrace. There were so many ways it could have been better. It is shameful that this was even released. I really was hoping and expecting to at least be entertained. This movie just completely misses the mark.

It is a waste of time to view this movie. You will never get that time back. Just don't do it. Ya, it's that bad.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22533,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2017-06-16","keywords":"los angeles california,singing in a car,bikini,male objectification,female objectification","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi62109977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E2NjkyZmYtZTNlZS00ZDVhLWIzZmItY2UwN2U5ZGExMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjMwMzc3MjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2E2NjkyZmYtZTNlZS00ZDVhLWIzZmItY2UwN2U5ZGExMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjMwMzc3MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the life and legacy of Tupac Shakur, including his rise to superstardom as a hip hop artist, actor, poet and activist, as well as his imprisonment and prolific, controversial time at Death Row Records.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7447307/","name":"Demetrius Shipp Jr.","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1775091/","name":"Danai Gurira","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334159/","name":"Kat Graham"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1534600/","name":"Benny Boom"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0346090/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353183/","name":"Jeremy Haft","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0327659/","name":"Eddie Gonzalez","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1691003/","name":"Steven Bagatourian"],"duration":"PT2H19M"</script><metacontent="

Furthermore I could not discover any weak-played other parts.The film really shows the difference in being in the field or being a manager far from where it all takes place. At the same it shows the despondency that falls on you not having a solution in our economics-based society. programme.title: Salt
Salt
programme.desc:
Salt: Directed by Phillip Noyce. With Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Daniel Olbrychski. A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0944835/","name":"Salt","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyODA2NDg4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjg4NDAwMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0944835/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Screen_Blitz"},"dateCreated":"2017-11-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is an explosive, briskly-paced spy action foray scorching with an appealing image of Angelina Jolie","reviewBody":"When Angelina Jolie makes her appearance on screen, chances are most people are interested in seeing in nothing but her kicking some major ass. And for those who relished in a good time of shoving popcorn in their mouth while watching her go gun-blazing in the action thriller 'Wanted' back in 2008, this one makes a sound, if slightly lesser option. This spy action thriller, helmed from director Phillip Noyce who brought his work to the screen with two Jack Ryan adaptations 'Patriot Games' and 'Clear and Present Danger', is just another one of your average trips to the land of Angelina Jolie wielding her action skills against the baddies as she fights her way through the sporadic blemishes in the script written by Kurt Wimmer. Unlike 'Wanted', this flick proceeds with a slightly more political agenda at hand, primarily the corruption uprooted from Russia since the beginning of their fallout with the United States during the Cold War. This film focuses on Evelyn Salt (played by Angelina Jolie), a CIA operative who is a living a peaceful life with her German boyfriend Michael Krause (played by August Diehl) and being held as one of the most respectable agents at her job. Her life comes crashing down when she is accused by a captured Russian agent Orlov (played by Daniel Olbrychski) of being a Russian sleeper agent with a plan to assassinate the President of the United States. With the law enforcement along with Agent Peabody (played by Chiwetel Eijiofor) pursuing her and her boss Ted Winter (played by Liev Schieber) the only one who fully trusts her, Salt must set out on a mission to clear her name. 

For a movie set on exhibiting Jolie in her frenetic ass-kicking mode, this one delivers for the most part. Watching the actress step into action with a frenetic gun-blazing, bone-crunching convulsion makes the tasty icing on the cake most action junkies crave for. But those who make the decision of taking the ride seriously fall victim to witnessing the flaws in the film's attempt at establishing a solid political complex. Adding substance to the plot is a political theme involving international corruption and relations between the U.S and Russia which ties knowledge the historical threats of the Soviet Union during the Cold War back in the 50s. It also makes the unfortunate feat of occasionally convoluting the plot, especially when throwing in a few twists and turns that will take audiences by surprise or leave them scratching their heads. Regardless, anyone willing to escape these blemishes are in for a nice treat, and that witnessing Angelina Jolie shoot, punch, and kick were way through the story in a sleek James Bond-style. Tension is kept high and the action falls nothing short of beauty, especially when adding explosions, car crashes, and vehicles slipping to the equation. For what the movie offers, it does enough to meet the appetite of cinema-goers hungry for a blend of sleek action thrills with brainy political subtext to go in the mix. 

Salt is an entertaining ride, if somewhat forgettable in terms of cinematic action mayhem. For those craving a sweet kick of action, this makes a fresh choice, though it nothing that reaches the peak of its genre. All that can be said is that fun and thrills is the best thing this movie delivers if nothing more.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":306900,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-07-21","keywords":"spy,russian,secret agent,one woman army,strong female lead","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Salt: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1236141849","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NWQwODgtNjA1YS00ZTEzLWE4NzYtZTUxODYzYmE1ODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NWQwODgtNjA1YS00ZTEzLWE4NzYtZTUxODYzYmE1ODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"Evelyn Salt (Jolie) is a CIA officer who swore an oath to duty, honor, and country. When she is accused by a defector of being a Russian sleeper spy, Salt goes on the run to clear her name and ultimately prove she is a patriot. Using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative, she must elude capture and protect her husband or the world's most powerful forces will erase any trace of her existence."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

And for those who relished in a good time of shoving popcorn in their mouth while watching her go gun-blazing in the action thriller 'Wanted' back in 2008, this one makes a sound, if slightly lesser option. This spy action thriller, helmed from director Phillip Noyce who brought his work to the screen with two Jack Ryan adaptations 'Patriot Games' and 'Clear and Present Danger', is just another one of your average trips to the land of Angelina Jolie wielding her action skills against the baddies as she fights her way through the sporadic blemishes in the script written by Kurt Wimmer. Unlike 'Wanted', this flick proceeds with a slightly more political agenda at hand, primarily the corruption uprooted from Russia since the beginning of their fallout with the United States during the Cold War. This film focuses on Evelyn Salt (played by Angelina Jolie), a CIA operative who is a living a peaceful life with her German boyfriend Michael Krause (played by August Diehl) and being held as one of the most respectable agents at her job. Her life comes crashing down when she is accused by a captured Russian agent Orlov (played by Daniel Olbrychski) of being a Russian sleeper agent with a plan to assassinate the President of the United States. With the law enforcement along with Agent Peabody (played by Chiwetel Eijiofor) pursuing her and her boss Ted Winter (played by Liev Schieber) the only one who fully trusts her, Salt must set out on a mission to clear her name. 

For a movie set on exhibiting Jolie in her frenetic ass-kicking mode, this one delivers for the most part. Watching the actress step into action with a frenetic gun-blazing, bone-crunching convulsion makes the tasty icing on the cake most action junkies crave for. But those who make the decision of taking the ride seriously fall victim to witnessing the flaws in the film's attempt at establishing a solid political complex. Adding substance to the plot is a political theme involving international corruption and relations between the U.S and Russia which ties knowledge the historical threats of the Soviet Union during the Cold War back in the 50s. It also makes the unfortunate feat of occasionally convoluting the plot, especially when throwing in a few twists and turns that will take audiences by surprise or leave them scratching their heads. Regardless, anyone willing to escape these blemishes are in for a nice treat, and that witnessing Angelina Jolie shoot, punch, and kick were way through the story in a sleek James Bond-style. Tension is kept high and the action falls nothing short of beauty, especially when adding explosions, car crashes, and vehicles slipping to the equation. For what the movie offers, it does enough to meet the appetite of cinema-goers hungry for a blend of sleek action thrills with brainy political subtext to go in the mix. 

Salt is an entertaining ride, if somewhat forgettable in terms of cinematic action mayhem. For those craving a sweet kick of action, this makes a fresh choice, though it nothing that reaches the peak of its genre. All that can be said is that fun and thrills is the best thing this movie delivers if nothing more.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":306900,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2010-07-21","keywords":"spy,russian,secret agent,one woman army,strong female lead","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Salt: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1236141849","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NWQwODgtNjA1YS00ZTEzLWE4NzYtZTUxODYzYmE1ODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NWQwODgtNjA1YS00ZTEzLWE4NzYtZTUxODYzYmE1ODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"Evelyn Salt (Jolie) is a CIA officer who swore an oath to duty, honor, and country. When she is accused by a defector of being a Russian sleeper spy, Salt goes on the run to clear her name and ultimately prove she is a patriot. Using all her skills and years of experience as a covert operative, she must elude capture and protect her husband or the world's most powerful forces will erase any trace of her existence.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Last Train to Christmas
Last Train to Christmas
programme.desc: Last Train to Christmas: Directed by Julian Kemp. With Michael Sheen, Cary Elwes, Nathalie Emmanuel, Katherine Kelly. Tony Towers is a local celebrity, a successful nightclub manager and he is engaged to a younger woman, Sue. Things get a little strange when he embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt14061008/","name":"Last Train to Christmas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ3OTM4NDktN2ExMy00OTNiLTlkNWMtYWViMTk0OWRlNjU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjI2MzI2NzU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Tony Towers is a local celebrity, a successful nightclub manager and he is engaged to a younger woman, Sue. Things get a little strange when he embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt14061008/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tim-783"},"dateCreated":"2021-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rod Serling meets Charles Dickens","reviewBody":""Last Train to Christmas" is not a conventional Christmas movie. It's more like Scrooge meets the Twilight Zone. It forces its central character (Sheen) to confront the consequences of his life choices with a level of horror not seen since Alastair Sim threw himself, prostrate, on his own grave, in 1951's "Christmas Carol," begging death for another chance.\n\nIn addition to Sheen's great performance the movie tours us through several decades of hair, fashion, hand held electronics and the decor of British Rail.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1895,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-12-18","keywords":"christmas","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Last Train to Christmas Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1774306073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjUzMjMxZDctZjZkOC00NzRmLWI0NDktN2I4OWFiNDc0MGVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjUzMjMxZDctZjZkOC00NzRmLWI0NDktN2I4OWFiNDc0MGVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790688/","name":"Michael Sheen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000144/","name":"Cary Elwes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2812026/","name":"Nathalie Emmanuel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447312/","name":"Julian Kemp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0792826/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0436913/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447312/","name":"Julian Kemp"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
Rendezvous mit Joe Black
programme.desc:
Meet Joe Black: Directed by Martin Brest. With Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins, Claire Forlani, Jake Weber. Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119643/","name":"Meet Joe Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0MzRmMTgtMTk4OS00MzdkLWJjNWMtZWJmZjlkYTI0YWRiL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pork_Scratchings"},"dateCreated":"2000-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best films of 1998, I can't praise this film enough!","reviewBody":"I must admit to have been slightly hesistant when I first heard about Meet Joe Black because of the subject matter and its length, however I found this film to be superb.

The acting was believable, the cinematography of the film was well thought out and extremely picturesque. The soundtrack by Thomas Newman (the Shawshank Redemption) went from chilling to the most beautiful melodies that I have ever heard (giving, in my humble opinion, any classical composer a run for their money), adding an extra depth to this film.

There are no in-betweens in this film: you WILL either love or hate this film. However, I can say that this film is one of the most uplifting and life affirming movies that I have ever seen. It left me both moved and confident that the world was not such a bad place after all. Just like the Shawshank Redemption told us that hope is not a bad thing, so Meet Joe Black tells us that indeed love can conquer all better than Titanic ever could.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":229526,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-11-13","keywords":"death,birthday,wealth,death personified,fear of death","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001231/","name":"Claire Forlani"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000976/","name":"Martin Brest"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045196/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651592/","name":"Ron Osborn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719734/","name":"Jeff Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905458/","name":"Kevin Wade"}],"duration":"PT2H58M"}</script><metacontent="

The acting was believable, the cinematography of the film was well thought out and extremely picturesque. programme.title: Fack ju Göhte 3
Fack Ju Göhte 3
programme.desc:
Fack ju Göhte 3: Directed by Bora Dagtekin. With Elyas M'Barek, Katja Riemann, Jella Haase, Sandra Hüller. A bank robber becomes a teacher after being released from prison and finds himself at the center of a number of crazy adventures." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6471264/","name":"Fack ju Göhte 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjlkYWJjZDItNzA2OS00ZWZjLTg4NmItNWRjMjJjNTZlODU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ3NzUxOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bank robber becomes a teacher after being released from prison and finds himself at the center of a number of crazy adventures.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6471264/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mrpanda-00412"},"dateCreated":"2017-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable, but nowhere as good as the first two movies","reviewBody":"This is the third part of a trilogy and as such the novelty of the scenario is fading. The first movie was surprisingly good and not as expected. The second movie played in an entirely different environment which added a few new elements to the story. Now the third movie's setting is back where it all started: at school.

To me it seemed like the movie does not really know what it wants to do. In the first two movies, the main protagonist (the ex-con teacher) gradually opened up to the children, became friendlier, and started to care for them. This movie reboots the whole thing by making our guy dislike the children at first, only to let him warm up throughout the movie once more. In general the movie seems to re-establish many things for viewers who have not seen the first two movies. The same thing goes for the jokes, which are very similar to the two previous movies, too similar even. Overall I just felt like the two movies never happened and we are seeing more or less the same thing again. Maybe this is why the first half-hour of the movie also seemed a bit like not having a clear purpose at all. The movie wants to establish the situation, but not really. It wants to continue where the predecessors left off, but not really. It throws around jokes that are not new, really.

The second part of the movie gets more interesting and starts following a clearer story-line, albeit in a linear and predictable way. This is not unsurprising for a comedy, but compared to the predecessors it is just not as good.

If you truly enjoyed the first two movies, you will still like this one. If you did not care for the first two movies, this one is definitely not for you. It suffers from exactly the same problems as similar trilogies at the point of the third installment. Take Despicable Me for example. Not a bad movie, just nothing new and no surprises for the viewer.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5556,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-10-26","keywords":"singing in a car,female teacher,teacher student relationship,teacher student conflict,munich germany","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153260825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065929/","name":"Elyas M'Barek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726257/","name":"Katja Riemann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3436464/","name":"Jella Haase"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

The same thing goes for the jokes, which are very similar to the two previous movies, too similar even. Overall I just felt like the two movies never happened and we are seeing more or less the same thing again. Maybe this is why the first half-hour of the movie also seemed a bit like not having a clear purpose at all. The movie wants to establish the situation, but not really. It wants to continue where the predecessors left off, but not really. It throws around jokes that are not new, really.

The second part of the movie gets more interesting and starts following a clearer story-line, albeit in a linear and predictable way. This is not unsurprising for a comedy, but compared to the predecessors it is just not as good.

If you truly enjoyed the first two movies, you will still like this one. If you did not care for the first two movies, this one is definitely not for you. It suffers from exactly the same problems as similar trilogies at the point of the third installment. Take Despicable Me for example. Not a bad movie, just nothing new and no surprises for the viewer.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5556,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2017-10-26","keywords":"singing in a car,female teacher,teacher student relationship,teacher student conflict,munich germany","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153260825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBhZGNlYTctYmYxYi00YmU2LTlhMDItN2E0ZjRjNzU4NmNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065929/","name":"Elyas M'Barek","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726257/","name":"Katja Riemann","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3436464/","name":"Jella Haase"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1480916/","name":"Bora Dagtekin"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Scream 3
Scream 3
programme.desc: Scream 3: Directed by Wes Craven. With Liev Schreiber, Beth Toussaint, Roger Jackson, Kelly Rutherford. While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0134084/","name":"Scream 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDljNmI1YzctNjJlZC00NzZlLWFlZTgtMDE4MjJiMDk0ZGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjg3MDQ0Mjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0134084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MOVIEFAN433"},"dateCreated":"2001-09-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"THE FINAL CHAPTER?....MAYBE","reviewBody":"Director Wes Craven and writer Ethen Krueger (taking over for Kevin Williamson) helped make this film happen. This time we're taken to Hollywood, California where Cotton Weary (Liev Schreiber) is now a talk show host, Gale Weathers (Courteney Cox Arquette)is a t. v journalist, Dewey Riley (David Arquette) is a technical advisor for the Stab 3 movie, and Sydney Prescott (Neve Campbell) is under a different name in order to protect herself. This time however there is a new killer(s) trying to get to Sydney, but it someone from her mother's past can Sydney survive another blood-bath as it seems the killer(s) is killing the cast members of the Stab 3 movie and won;t stop until Sydney is dead! My thoughts a great ending to the trilogy it definately has a few good scares and fills a lot of plot holes of why Maureen was killed. I won't give anything away but the killer(s) was a big surprise.RECOMMENDED! ***1/2 out of *****"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":131846,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-02-04","keywords":"mystery killer,serial killer,masked killer,tape over mouth,horror icon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scream 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi914204185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZjBiODktNTk0Zi00YTg0LThkZjMtMmFkMWZlNTg1MWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZjBiODktNTk0Zi00YTg0LThkZjMtMmFkMWZlNTg1MWIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT#1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000274/","name":"David Arquette"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001073/","name":"Courteney Cox"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013899/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
An jedem verdammten Sonntag
programme.desc:
Any Given Sunday: Directed by Oliver Stone. With Al Pacino, Cameron Diaz, Dennis Quaid, James Woods. A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0146838/","name":"Any Given Sunday","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDk2YTQxZjUtYzJkYi00MTk4LTk4NDAtZmQ3ZGQwMDQxY2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0146838/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Don-102"},"dateCreated":"2000-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Dizzying, Entertaining Peek Into Pro Football...Stone Style","reviewBody":"Sports movies are tough to make. Creating the essence of the actual event is the toughest. Most films fall short in the editing process of the event or through sheer carelessness and lack of knowledge. ANY GIVEN SUNDAY is somewhat of an exception. It is hard-hitting and bloody like NORTH DALLAS FORTY. It is actually conventional when you think about it, like a warped RUDY. It is a hell of a lot more realistic than say, NECESSARY ROUGHNESS. These are all football films with varying degrees of success (except ROUGHNESS), but Oliver Stone, in his usual over the top way, throws a dizzying, mind-splitting film at us, much like the sport itself. This is why I liked it.

Oliver Stone began a wicked spell of filmmaking with JFK, evident in its editing style. Fast-paced, black and white mixed with color, documentary-like methods ensued in NATURAL BORN KILLERS, NIXON, and the ghastly U-TURN. Nothing is new here with ANY GIVEN SUNDAY. Football is a battlefield Stone chooses to depict and depict it he does. Even the most ardent fans of the sport do not really know what it is like for a quarterback to drop back and get rid of a piece of pigskin before 11 players maul him. You certainly get the idea watching this. 

Al Pacino is the dried up head coach of the fictional Miami Sharks and he barks out the usual coaching cliches you hear in press conferences after real games. Pacino also seems to be sleep-walking through the picture. At times, he appears drunk even when he is not supposed to be. Cameron Diaz's character, a young chick owner, (yeah right) destroys any credibility the film may have had going in (Even the NFL would have nothing to do with this movie). Her constant bickering is so over-done, you almost feel like hurling much the way Jamie Foxx does every time he enters a game as the team's 3rd string quarterback. Realisticly speaking, this is not a very sane film about football. It is a maniacal celebration of the game. The scenes on the field are the ones I cherished. Beware of the locker room or domestic sequences.

No one has ever put such energy into football scenes in a film before. He definitely had some good consultants. There are some comical cameos - Johnny Unitas and Dick Butkus play opposing coaches. Lawrence Taylor can actually act a teeny bit and Jim Brown shares the film's best off the field scene with Pacino in a bar. Stone tries to show us how the game has changed. He resonates past glory with quotes from Lombardi, dissolves showing Red "the Galloping Ghost" Grange, and even Unitas handing off to Ameche. TV has changed everything, says the coach, and he is right. It seems to be all about the money nowadays.

That is the message, but you'll find yourself losing that idea in the lunacy of ANY GIVEN SUNDAY and the bone-crushing, ear-damaging football scenes. They are filmed and cut with such raw intensity, you feel like playing afterwards. This is definitely a film for football fans only unless you like big, sweaty men. Is there a big game at the end that needs to be won? Yes, and this surprised me considering how unconventional Stone usually is. Basically, surrender your senses and thought process to Stone's most entertaining film in quite some time.

RATING: ***","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":116425,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sport"],"datePublished":"1999-12-22","keywords":"nudity,black penis,american football,male objectification,man wrapped in a towel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000598/","name":"Dennis Quaid"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119040/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001946/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002417/","name":"Daniel Pyne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517589/","name":"John Logan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000231/","name":"Oliver Stone"}],"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
Rendezvous mit Joe Black
programme.desc:
Meet Joe Black: Directed by Martin Brest. With Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins, Claire Forlani, Jake Weber. Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119643/","name":"Meet Joe Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0MzRmMTgtMTk4OS00MzdkLWJjNWMtZWJmZjlkYTI0YWRiL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119643/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pork_Scratchings"},"dateCreated":"2000-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best films of 1998, I can't praise this film enough!","reviewBody":"I must admit to have been slightly hesistant when I first heard about Meet Joe Black because of the subject matter and its length, however I found this film to be superb.

The acting was believable, the cinematography of the film was well thought out and extremely picturesque. The soundtrack by Thomas Newman (the Shawshank Redemption) went from chilling to the most beautiful melodies that I have ever heard (giving, in my humble opinion, any classical composer a run for their money), adding an extra depth to this film.

There are no in-betweens in this film: you WILL either love or hate this film. However, I can say that this film is one of the most uplifting and life affirming movies that I have ever seen. It left me both moved and confident that the world was not such a bad place after all. Just like the Shawshank Redemption told us that hope is not a bad thing, so Meet Joe Black tells us that indeed love can conquer all better than Titanic ever could.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":229526,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Romance"],"datePublished":"1998-11-13","keywords":"death,birthday,wealth,death personified,fear of death","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001231/","name":"Claire Forlani"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000976/","name":"Martin Brest"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045196/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651592/","name":"Ron Osborn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719734/","name":"Jeff Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905458/","name":"Kevin Wade"}],"duration":"PT2H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hulk
Hulk
programme.desc:
Hulk: Directed by Ang Lee. With Eric Bana, Jennifer Connelly, Sam Elliott, Josh Lucas. Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0286716/","name":"Hulk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzQwZDg1MGEtN2E5My00ZDJlLWI4MzItM2U2MjJhYzlkNmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDAxNjkxNjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286716/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CGA_Soupdragon"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very impressive!","reviewBody":"I finally caught up with the film on DVD, after missing its cinema release and just not having the urge to see it until now. It has had some rather bad press, so I wasn't actually expecting very much.

One of the reasons I have waited so long was to let my son, (who is now eight) grow up a bit before seeing it. He was interested in the tie-in products filling the shelves in all the stores on release. A blanket-marketing ploy that is becoming more and more hysterical, I fear.

Another was that I was wary of renting it as the Hulk character has been rather mal-treated in live-action form.

Until Ang Lee's film.

Firstly, this isn't by any stretch of the imagination, a kids' film. Though my younger children watched it, it gave them serious food for thought about what scientists do to animals and people in the name of science. My oldest was enthralled. She appreciated Lee's magnificent use of the film medium.

This is a very dark movie. The origin-story has been manipulated and updated linking the two lead characters (Bana and Connelly) in a sorrowful, fearful event that happened to them both in their childhood. Nice touch.

"Banner's" (Eric Bana's) father (played by Nick Nolte) shuffles back into his life after 30 years incarceration for causing the events that had traumatized the young Banner. Banner later finds that his father had "experimented" on him when they were still a whole family. This creepy device effectively modernizes the story and it's ultimate revelation is a clever way of releasing the pent-up rage that Banner jr has locked within his mind. This rage feeds the Hulk. Banner finally becomes the Hulk after some incredible bravery in the lab.

The film's effects are superb. I am a very happy viewer. This is great cinema. A wonderful adaptation of a tortured, misunderstood human being.

Highly recommended, by me, for true Hulk fans."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261186,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2003-06-20","keywords":"radiation,monster,scientist,general,technology","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hulk","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1139409177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQyNGIxMzctM2NkYy00ZWY4LWIwN2MtYzJmNDQ3MDJiNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQyNGIxMzctM2NkYy00ZWY4LWIwN2MtYzJmNDQ3MDJiNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0051509/","name":"Eric Bana"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000124/","name":"Jennifer Connelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000385/","name":"Sam Elliott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0095134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092570/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456158/","name":"Jack Kirby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="
