programme.title: Wilde Maus
Wilde Maus
programme.desc: Wilde Maus: Directed by Josef Hader. With Josef Hader, Pia Hierzegger, Georg Friedrich, Jörg Hartmann. When Georg loses his job, he conceals the fact from his younger wife Johanna, who wants a child with him. Instead, he embarks upon a campaign of revenge against his former boss and begins to renovate a roller-coaster with an old school friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5376196/","name":"Wilde Maus","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGE5OTBkM2QtYmFkZC00ZjE1LTk1YTItNDM3ODllNWFiMTAxL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ3NzUxOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Georg loses his job, he conceals the fact from his younger wife Johanna, who wants a child with him. Instead, he embarks upon a campaign of revenge against his former boss and begins to renovate a roller-coaster with an old scho","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5376196/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rudi-16796"},"dateCreated":"2017-06-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Austrian comedy","reviewBody":"Thank goodness for a well-crafted, old-fashioned comedy with sensible editing, excellent performances and a witty plot structure. "Wild Mouse" is a truly humorous, enjoyable movie. With gentle satire, the pathos of our human foibles is shown with finely drawn relationships. Although there is a likeness with Woody Allen's schemes here nobody is driven over the edge into extreme violence and tragedy. The main protagonists are Georg, who for years has been an erudite but somewhat snobbish and fierce classical music critic and his wife, a psychotherapist and counselor who at 43 has a belated desire to become pregnant. However, all their efforts have been fruitless, causing bilateral blaming and stress which she is unable to address despite her proficiency in such matters. Meanwhile, with the media business in decline Georg is made redundant but does not have the nerve to tell her. Instead he pretends going to work whilst helping an old school chum to run a fair ground roller-coaster, the 'Wild Mouse'. At the same time, he is taking feeble revenge on the chief editor who fired him by vandalizing his car. Then the story gets more complicated and comical The film's characters are cocooned within their own preconceptions and limitations, as well as being trapped and pushed by work and social expectations, but they are not fundamentally malicious. Exasperated by such pressures they might however, act irrationally and get themselves into a 'spot of trouble' with some hilariously funny outcomes. I liked 'Wild Mouse' a lot and left the cinema smiling, whilst feeling quite reflective and slightly sad too. I'd rate it four out of five or a little more.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2502,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-02-17","keywords":"excuse,friend,car damage,prater vienna,female psychotherapist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352780/","name":"Josef Hader"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1514571/","name":"Pia Hierzegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295429/","name":"Georg Friedrich"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352780/","name":"Josef Hader"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0215798/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0061958/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352780/","name":"Josef Hader"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0101452/","name":"Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMzMGY4MWMtZmY5MC00NzVjLWJlMzQtMTQ2ZTM4ZWNmYzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0101452/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Super Mike"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"The brilliant intertextual links to Bergman's "Seventh Seal"","reviewBody":"William Sadler's portrail of "Death" in this film is a perfect mirror image of the same character in Ingmar Bergman's classic film, "The Seventh Seal" (1957). The scene of challenging the grim reaper to games of chance such as clue, battleship and twister is a wonderful intertextual link back to the original film in which the game of chance that is chosen is chess. programme.title: Miss Congeniality
Miss Undercover
programme.desc:
Miss Congeniality: Directed by Donald Petrie. With Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt, Candice Bergen. An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0212346/","name":"Miss Congeniality","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDhjNzc4N2MtNWE5ZC00N2M4LWFiYjEtMTE5YmYyMTg3OGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkzODUwNzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0212346/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hitchcockthelegend"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"The last time I was this naked in public I was coming out of a uterus!","reviewBody":"Miss Congeniality finds Sandra Bullock as FBI Agent Gracie Hart, who must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a psychopath from committing untold homicide.

The premise is simple, it's a Pygmalion/My Fair Lady scenario that transforms the rough and tough Gracie into a viable contestant for the pageant. Thus we have all the comedy that comes with her literally battling everyone, including her own opinions on pageants, as she is being asked to be something she doesn't believe is in her make up. The mystery of who the killer is who's on the loose is strong for a good portion of film, and even once it's known and drama takes centre stage, it's still hard to get the smile off of your face. 

The jokes are plentiful, with Bullock finding chemistry with all of her co-stars. She's a very under valued comedy actress, and her ability to bond with an entire cast is marvellous to observe. Reference sexual tension with Benjamin Bratt, the jousting hostilities with Ernie Hudson, the way she bounces off of the other beautiful girls, and best of all the by-play with Michael Caine, who is playing a camp stylist and walks in to lift the laughter roof off the rafters in every scene he is in.

It doesn't push the boundaries of comedy, but it's thankfully a consistently funny piece of work, aided by a super cast on form who make a better comedy out of what the screenplay suggested it had any right to be. 7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":199919,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2001-04-11","keywords":"beauty contest,fbi federal bureau of investigation,knee high boots,boots,pageant","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Miss Congeniality","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1980671001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwNDcxYjQtOTNmMy00YzA3LWFhNmQtMGZkYjY5N2Y0Y2MyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwNDcxYjQtOTNmMy00YzA3LWFhNmQtMGZkYjY5N2Y0Y2MyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Miss Congeniality"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000973/","name":"Benjamin Bratt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677953/","name":"Donald Petrie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108864/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024939/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0492909/","name":"Marc Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0974301/","name":"Katie Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524095/","name":"Caryn Lucas"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

FBI.When she is traveling throughout the country along with the bodyguard agent named Sam Fuller(Regina King:Ray,Down of earth) are kidnapped her fried Cheryl(Heather Burns:Miss Congenialty I), Miss sweetheart(Elizabeth Rom : Law and order)working for the local chief .Firstly she goes undercover to hotel Venice where finds a clues and makes an amusing confusion with Dolly Parton .But she investigates against the orders of local authority(Treat Williams:Everwood)using all the means to find the dangerous criminal.\n\nThe movie displays action,comedy,suspense and is pretty entertaining.This sequel appear similar characters as the first,thus her friend Heather Burns who she knew as a contestant in the Miss United States beauty pageant, William Shatner,Ernie Hudson but no Benjamin Bratt but the starring has broken with him.Sandra Bullock is sympathetic and funny though repeating her role as untameable tomboy agent.Regina King as her tough,brawny partner is likable.They form a peculiar duo ,making a special buddy movie.Lively,jolly musical score by Tongeren and atmospheric cinematography by Peter Menzies.The motion picture is correctly directed by John Pasquin.The programme.title: Anger Management
Die Wutprobe
programme.desc:
Anger Management: Directed by Peter Segal. With Adam Sandler, Jack Nicholson, Marisa Tomei, Luis Guzmán. Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0305224/","name":"Anger Management","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg1YTNiODItZGYyOC00NGIwLWI3MjYtMTY3NDQ0ZDIwYjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dave Buznik is a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0305224/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjw2305"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good Fun, even if it's a little muddled","reviewBody":"Adam Sandler (Dave Buznik) is a mild mannered and submissive business man with an apparent knack for getting himself into unfortunate and disastrous situations. After a very small misunderstanding aboard an aeroplane escalates out of control, Dave is sentenced to Anger Management at the hands of Jack Nicholson (Buddy Rydell) 

Dr. Rydell is a therapist with a tendency for the unusual. As the therapy progresses things seem to get worse and after another huge slice of misfortune, Dr. Rydell is forced to move in with Dave and conduct 30 days of intensive Anger Management.

With good comic performances from Sandler and especially Nicholson and some hilarious interaction from the support cast 'Anger Management' is certainly not short of laughs; but it does seem to get a little muddled along the way. That said the movie finishes well (although totally unbelievable) and ends up as a comedy film you'd be silly to miss out on.

7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":210711,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-06-18","keywords":"lesbian,lesbian kiss,anger,airplane,sexual attraction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Anger Management","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi945792025","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjQ1NmFjMTMtZWViOC00ZDlhLWI0YTYtY2MwZGVlMDQwMTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjQ1NmFjMTMtZWViOC00ZDlhLWI0YTYtY2MwZGVlMDQwMTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Anger Management"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000197/","name":"Jack Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000673/","name":"Marisa Tomei"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781842/","name":"Peter Segal"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0153052/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0233563/","name":"David Dorfman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Family Man
Family Man – Eine himmlische Entscheidung
programme.desc:
The Family Man: Directed by Brett Ratner. With Nicolas Cage, Téa Leoni, Don Cheadle, Jeremy Piven. A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0218967/","name":"The Family Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzYzMTQ4NDYtNWRkZi00NTYxLThlZDItMzI1MmU1MmU5ZWQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDA5Mjg5MjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0218967/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjw2305"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Touching Romantic comedy","reviewBody":"Nicholas Cage and Tea Leoni steal the show in this very pleasant movie. Jack Campbell (Cage) is a Wall Street investment banker at the top of his profession, that is until one Christmas eve, when he stumbles into the middle of a grocery store hold up. The next day he wakes up married to his college sweetheart Kate Reynolds (Leoni) and he has children. When he finds his old life no longer exists he has to adjust his lifestyle to fit in with his family.

With slight comparisons to Sliding Doors in the way the story works and the concept of life altering decisions 'Family Man' is very entertaining, charming and heart warming, not to mention subtly amusing throughout. Cage and Leoni are a great on-screen couple and the story is definitely intriguing enough to make for compulsive viewing.

7/10 Not as good as Sliding Doors, but its definitely worthy of your attention.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":107886,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2001-09-12","keywords":"christmas,parallel universe,career man,reflection,crisis of conscience","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi318685465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRmZjg2MTgtN2NmMS00ODAyLTg4OWItODFlMTRiZTBmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRmZjg2MTgtN2NmMS00ODAyLTg4OWItODFlMTRiZTBmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000332/","name":"Don Cheadle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0711840/","name":"Brett Ratner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064908/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009876/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224606/","name":"David Diamond"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919289/","name":"David Weissman"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Mr. Deeds: Directed by Steven Brill. With Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder, John Turturro, Allen Covert. A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0280590/","name":"Mr. Deeds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU3NTE3M2QtNWQ0MS00ZmRkLWIwNTMtOTA0ZGM5N2UwMWNjL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0280590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tfrizzell"},"dateCreated":"2002-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stick With Capra's Version Instead.","reviewBody":"The remake to Frank Capra's 1936 masterpiece "Mr. Deeds Goes to Town" lacks the charm, heart and intelligence of that production. The titled character (Adam Sandler) inherits an outrageous fortune from a relative he did not even know about and New York opportunists led by the sleazy Peter Gallagher try to take advantage of Sandler's kindness and generosity towards others. Naturally Sandler is much smarter than he first appears and proves to be an individual that can handle swindlers. However he does let his guard down around supposed school nurse Winona Ryder (in actuality a reporter for a tabloid) and that is when his big-city troubles start. "Mr. Deeds" is a watchable and somewhat entertaining film that works because of Sandler's screen persona. Sandler continues to raise films that are duds just because of his enormous talents. The same is true with this one. Watch for "Fargo" alums Steve Buscemi and Harve Presnell as well as a long cameo from ex-tennis superstar John McEnroe. 2.5 out of 5 stars."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":141111,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"unknowing heir,sudden wealth,fish out of water,character name as title,liar revealed","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mr. Deeds","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi641967129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzM2E4YjEtNTljNi00ZWI0LTg5YmEtNDEzNDRiNzQ3Y2YzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzM2E4YjEtNTljNi00ZWI0LTg5YmEtNDEzNDRiNzQ3Y2YzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Mr. Deeds"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001806/","name":"John Turturro"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0109359/","name":"Steven Brill"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445502/","name":"Clarence Budington Kelland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0728307/","name":"Robert Riskin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379056/","name":"Tim Herlihy"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Watch for "Fargo" alums Steve Buscemi and Harve Presnell as well as a long cameo from ex-tennis superstar John McEnroe. 2.5 out of 5 stars.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":141111,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"unknowing heir,sudden wealth,fish out of water,character name as title,liar revealed","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mr. Deeds","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi641967129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzM2E4YjEtNTljNi00ZWI0LTg5YmEtNDEzNDRiNzQ3Y2YzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzM2E4YjEtNTljNi00ZWI0LTg5YmEtNDEzNDRiNzQ3Y2YzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Mr. Deeds","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000213/","name":"Winona Ryder","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001806/","name":"John Turturro"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0109359/","name":"Steven Brill"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059609/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445502/","name":"Clarence Budington Kelland","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0728307/","name":"Robert Riskin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379056/","name":"Tim Herlihy"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pixels
Pixels
programme.desc:
Pixels: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Michelle Monaghan, Peter Dinklage. When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2120120/","name":"Pixels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzM4NDY5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg1NTI3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2120120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"auvoir-42113"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Look at most of the reviews and judge for yourself","reviewBody":"This is my first review and i really had to write it after just coming back from watching Pixels.

I'm not going to really talk about the movie, the premise is simple, its just a show about the old arcade games attacking the world. 

Is it fun? Hell yeah it is. 

Is it funny? Yep, sure is, is it really really funny? Not really, but are there really really funny shows out there anymore? Nope

Is it worth your money? Yes it is. 

So look here, the show is about ARCADE GAMES ATTACKING THE WORLD, so why take things so seriously? The people who slam this movie are going on and on about acting, the show being not funny, lame jokes, Adam Sandler trying to make money

Please..who makes movies not to earn money? Look at yourselves, if you didn't enjoy yourself at this movie, you probably are taking life or yourselves too seriously. 

The ratings are low because people enjoy arty farty movies too much? Or they are trying to show that they are sophisticated? Movies are supposed to be fun and this one sure is. Looking at the ratings at rotten tomatoes epitomizes the way people think nowadays, all uptight, trying to find a perfect movie and just plain wet blankets.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138697,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2015-07-23","keywords":"arcade game,alien,product placement,donkey kong,pac man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722883097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYwMDk0NTY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTMzMDU3NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYwMDk0NTY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTMzMDU3NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157358/","name":"Michelle Monaghan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049799/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379056/","name":"Tim Herlihy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000251/","name":"Timothy Dowling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1268896/","name":"Patrick Jean"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Rise of the Planet of the Apes: Directed by Rupert Wyatt. With Andy Serkis, Karin Konoval, Terry Notary, Richard Ridings. A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1318514/","name":"Rise of the Planet of the Apes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE3ZmNlZTctMDdmNy00MjMzLWFmZmYtN2M5N2YyYTQ1ZDJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1318514/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieAddict2016"},"dateCreated":"2011-08-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Against all odds, this must be the best "blockbuster" I've seen all summer.","reviewBody":"Summer 2011 will go down in history as one of the more disappointing seasons in many years when it comes to movies. This is the time of year that people rush out in masses to see the latest action extravaganza, and to be fair, some films have delivered on that promise -- "Harry Potter," "Captain America" (though I have yet to see either of them and am simply relying on general reactions) -- but there's been a whole lot of disappointments, too, and the worst part is that people still seem to be flocking to them, almost out of necessity than wont ("Transformers 3" and "Pirates 4" both made over $1 bil worldwide, which is amazing, because they both sucked).

I think the last film anyone expected to reverse the trend this summer was a prequel to a franchise that has been consistently poor over the years since its original incarnation in 1968. Indeed, the first trailer for "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" focused on ape carnage and mayhem, and although a subsequent one highlighted the dramatic underpinning of the film, it seemed like Fox was just trying to turn around its marketing and fool people into thinking there was more than meets the eye.

Alas, the second trailer turned out to be a far more accurate reflection of the movie than anyone would have expected. "Rise of the Apes" is most likely the best film of the blockbuster season, full of heart, carefully crafted and professionally delivered on every level.

Sure, the story has its fair share of clichés -- the "evil caretakers" played by Brian Cox and Tom Felton seem bad just because the film requires them to be, and Felton's performance in particular is so over-the-top that it's almost a caricature -- but because of how the film is packaged, and because it spends so much time focusing on the character of Caesar (played magnificently by Andy Serkis), you are willing to overlook many of the flaws. You care about the characters and the story, even when you kinda know where it's headed and feel like it's a variation of a prison break-out movie with apes in place of humans.

The human cast, as has been noted by many critics, is nothing to write home about. James Franco doesn't exactly phone in his performance but it's not the sort of role that is going to be lining him up for any awards. Toby Maguire was originally lined up for the project before he was dropped (he reportedly came to Fox with script notes, and they promptly cut off discussions with him), but Franco does seem a more natural fit, and does well enough in a role destined to be sidelined by the apes.

And the apes are awesome. No, we haven't quite mastered fully realistic CGI yet -- especially when it's mixed with live actors. (WETA claims that the technology here is superior to "Avatar," but it's not as convincing, perhaps because the CGI so rarely interacted with human actors in "Avatar," and thus we were able to accept the fantasy world more willingly.) However, this is some of the best seen to date. Serkis (who previously played King Kong in Peter Jackson's remake) translates a brilliant performance, for which the film owes a great deal; Caesar is really the crux of the whole thing, and a poor or less realistic performance would have undermined the whole thing. It's the subtle stuff here that makes a difference -- the emotions captured in Caesar's facial expressions, or the glint of sympathy in his eyes when John Lithgow's character begins to suffer from Alzheimer's. There's a moment of genius in that particular scene where Caesar exchanges a sad, knowing glance with Franco's character, and it's eerily touching.

Director Rupert Wyatt follows blockbuster blueprints from beginning to end, but by enriching the first three-quarters of his film with character development and an actual *story* (something so many blockbusters these days seem to be sorely lacking), when the big action sequence arrives at the end, you're invested in what's happening -- and you actually care.

I confess to never having watched many of the "Apes" films. I do recall seeing the Tim Burton remake in theaters a decade ago, and even as a 12-year-old kid, I thought, Wow, this sucks. "Rise" is infinitely better, more creative and more emotionally stirring -- as aforementioned, it's nothing completely unique or novel from a storytelling standpoint, but it's well-crafted in an old-fashioned, refreshingly familiar way, and the addition of groundbreaking CGI makes it a "must-see" rather than something to catch on television. Fox isn't known for pleasing fans with their remakes and sequels (whether it be Die Hard or Wolverine), but Summer 2011 sees two of their biggest properties successfully reinvigorated: first "X-Men First Class," and now this. For my money, "Apes" is better -- perhaps the best blockbuster of the season -- which I never in a million years expected to say.

Without spoiling anything, the film sets itself up for a sequel. Considering it's on track to smash expectations and take in $55 mil this weekend alone, it's pretty much a sure-thing that it will happen. Hopefully the follow-up takes heed of this film's strengths and doesn't abandon the character development in favor of boisterous action sequences. The fact that audiences are reacting strongly to this movie is an indication of what's been lacking all summer: stories with characters we care about. Go see this if you want to end a disappointing summer on a positive note.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":512439,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-08-05","keywords":"ape,chimpanzee,planet of the apes,alzheimer's disease,when animals attack","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1615502617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NDI4MjU5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTgwMDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NDI4MjU5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTgwMDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rise of the Planet of the Apes: Trailer #2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0785227/","name":"Andy Serkis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2951768/","name":"Freida Pinto"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1012501/","name":"Rupert Wyatt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0174373/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286257/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0415425/","name":"Rick Jaffa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798646/","name":"Amanda Silver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0099541/","name":"Pierre Boulle"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

programme.desc: Close Encounters of the Third Kind: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Richard Dreyfuss, François Truffaut, Teri Garr, Melinda Dillon. Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0075860/","name":"Close Encounters of the Third Kind","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM1NjE5NjQxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjYzMzQxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0075860/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"therskybznuiss"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Of My Favorites!","reviewBody":"This movie does so, so much right. I believe there's more going on under the hood than even your average Spielburg Movie - alledgedly a lot of this actually happened and J Allan Hynek was an advisor in the concept of this movie,\n\nI'd believe it. The conflict is so cerebral, and intrapersonal, and it feels so organic. The brilliant performances, and complete climax leading to a beautiful ending with such a hopeful message makes this one of my favorites.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194590,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1978-12-25","keywords":"alien,mothership,close encounter of the third kind,single mother,vision","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Close Encounters of the Third Kind","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1849145625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjA4MDY5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk0NTkyMzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjA4MDY5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk0NTkyMzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Re-Release Trailer for Close Encounters of the Third Kind"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000377/","name":"Richard Dreyfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000076/","name":"François Truffaut"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000414/","name":"Teri Garr"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0328941/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103338/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0059493/","name":"Hal Barwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069547/","name":"Jerry Belson"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Color Out of Space
Die Farbe aus dem All
programme.desc: Color Out of Space: Directed by Richard Stanley. With Nicolas Cage, Joely Richardson, Madeleine Arthur, Elliot Knight. A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5073642/","name":"Color Out of Space","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTM4M2UtMTQxNS00YjdjLTgwZGYtZTgzYmFiYjFkYzNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5073642/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BodinDB"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty obvious...","reviewBody":"It seems fairly obvious to me who has and who has not read this short story, or any Lovecraft for that matter. So many reviews rating this movie a 1 and claiming that there is no point to the movie. A lot of Lovecraft's work is centered around how terrifying the "unknown" is. You are supposed to feel unnerved and confused, you are meant to ask yourself "What the hell is going on?" No this movie may not be a 100% pure adaptation to the original story, but any Lovecraft story will need some tweaks to translate to film, that is just the nature of his stories. They are meant to tap into the limits of your imagination. That is harder to do with visual movies. Anyway, if you enjoy Lovecraft them give this movie a watch!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42953,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2021-08-10","keywords":"meteorite,farm,alpaca,farmhouse,hydrologist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi735493913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000613/","name":"Joely Richardson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4699715/","name":"Madeleine Arthur"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822582/","name":"Richard Stanley"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0440557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692305/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0244345/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522454/","name":"H.P. IMDb data; ttnr: 5073642, Title: Color Out of Space, --- Description: Color Out of Space: Directed by Richard Stanley. With Nicolas Cage, Joely Richardson, Madeleine Arthur, Elliot Knight. A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5073642/","name":"Color Out of Space","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTM4M2UtMTQxNS00YjdjLTgwZGYtZTgzYmFiYjFkYzNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A secluded farm is struck by a strange meteorite which has apocalyptic consequences for the family living there and possibly the world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5073642/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"BodinDB","dateCreated":"2020-06-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty obvious...","reviewBody":"It seems fairly obvious to me who has and who has not read this short story, or any Lovecraft for that matter. So many reviews rating this movie a 1 and claiming that there is no point to the movie. A lot of Lovecraft's work is centered around how terrifying the "unknown" is. You are supposed to feel unnerved and confused, you are meant to ask yourself "What the hell is going on?" No this movie may not be a 100% pure adaptation to the original story, but any Lovecraft story will need some tweaks to translate to film, that is just the nature of his stories. They are meant to tap into the limits of your imagination. That is harder to do with visual movies. Anyway, if you enjoy Lovecraft them give this movie a watch!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42953,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2021-08-10","keywords":"meteorite,farm,alpaca,farmhouse,hydrologist","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi735493913","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmM3MGQyZDEtYTFiMi00MzFiLWE4ODQtY2NiMzMzYzIyZjUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000613/","name":"Joely Richardson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4699715/","name":"Madeleine Arthur"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822582/","name":"Richard Stanley"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0440557/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692305/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0244345/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522454/","name":"H.P. programme.title: The Martian
Der Marsianer – Rettet Mark Watney
programme.desc: The Martian: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels. An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3659388/","name":"The Martian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MTQ3MDA1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODA3OTI4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3659388/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smart, exciting crowd-pleaser","reviewBody":"Exceptional sci-fi drama from Ridley Scott about an astronaut (Matt Damon) stranded on Mars and the efforts made to rescue him. As others have pointed out, there's more than a little bit here that reminds you of movies like Apollo 13 and Cast Away (particularly the former). I fail to see how that's a knock on it but it's being presented as such by some. We all come to movies with our own expectations and baggage. I'm not a Scott fanboy expecting him to wow me (his last two films were not great). I just wanted to be entertained and this did the trick. It's a movie aimed at the masses that is smarter than your average movie aimed at the masses. Maybe it's not for all nerds (a quick glance at some of the reviews shows a lot of inane nit-picking from people who seem to have no concept of dramatic license), but I didn't find the movie dumbed-down at all. I also want to say how much I appreciated that this managed to stay remarkably light and positive while still maintaining the tension, proving once again that you don't have to be depressing to be good drama. If you haven't seen The Martian yet, you should. It's a great film with a first-rate cast, good direction, and stellar effects. If you're just looking for a quality movie to entertain you for a while, this should be something you'll enjoy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":809330,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-10-07","keywords":"astronaut,space habitat,left for dead,presumed dead,nasa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi113423129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyOTA4MDQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTg1MDA2NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyOTA4MDQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTg1MDA2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer #2 for The Martian starring Matt Damon."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1567113/","name":"Jessica Chastain"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325419/","name":"Kristen Wiig"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1206844/","name":"Drew Goddard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1083982/","name":"Andy Weir"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pixels
Pixels
programme.desc:
Pixels: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Michelle Monaghan, Peter Dinklage. When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2120120/","name":"Pixels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMzM4NDY5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg1NTI3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2120120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"auvoir-42113"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Look at most of the reviews and judge for yourself","reviewBody":"This is my first review and i really had to write it after just coming back from watching Pixels.

I'm not going to really talk about the movie, the premise is simple, its just a show about the old arcade games attacking the world. 

Is it fun? Hell yeah it is. 

Is it funny? Yep, sure is, is it really really funny? Not really, but are there really really funny shows out there anymore? Nope

Is it worth your money? Yes it is. 

So look here, the show is about ARCADE GAMES ATTACKING THE WORLD, so why take things so seriously? The people who slam this movie are going on and on about acting, the show being not funny, lame jokes, Adam Sandler trying to make money

Please..who makes movies not to earn money? Look at yourselves, if you didn't enjoy yourself at this movie, you probably are taking life or yourselves too seriously. 

The ratings are low because people enjoy arty farty movies too much? Or they are trying to show that they are sophisticated? Movies are supposed to be fun and this one sure is. Looking at the ratings at rotten tomatoes epitomizes the way people think nowadays, all uptight, trying to find a perfect movie and just plain wet blankets.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138697,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2015-07-23","keywords":"arcade game,alien,product placement,donkey kong,pac man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722883097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYwMDk0NTY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTMzMDU3NTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYwMDk0NTY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTMzMDU3NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001191/","name":"Adam Sandler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157358/","name":"Michelle Monaghan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049799/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379056/","name":"Tim Herlihy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000251/","name":"Timothy Dowling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1268896/","name":"Patrick Jean"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
Unheimliche Begegnung der Dritten Art – Director's Cut
programme.desc: Close Encounters of the Third Kind: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Richard Dreyfuss, François Truffaut, Teri Garr, Melinda Dillon. Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0075860/","name":"Close Encounters of the Third Kind","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM1NjE5NjQxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjYzMzQxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Roy Neary, an Indiana electric lineman, finds his quiet and ordinary daily life turned upside down after a close encounter with a UFO, spurring him to an obsessed cross-country quest for answers as a momentous event approaches.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0075860/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"therskybznuiss"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Of My Favorites!","reviewBody":"This movie does so, so much right. I believe there's more going on under the hood than even your average Spielburg Movie - alledgedly a lot of this actually happened and J Allan Hynek was an advisor in the concept of this movie,\n\nI'd believe it. The conflict is so cerebral, and intrapersonal, and it feels so organic. The brilliant performances, and complete climax leading to a beautiful ending with such a hopeful message makes this one of my favorites.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194590,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1978-12-25","keywords":"alien,mothership,close encounter of the third kind,single mother,vision","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Close Encounters of the Third Kind","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1849145625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjA4MDY5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk0NTkyMzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjA4MDY5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk0NTkyMzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Re-Release Trailer for Close Encounters of the Third Kind"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000377/","name":"Richard Dreyfuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000076/","name":"François Truffaut"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000414/","name":"Teri Garr"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0328941/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103338/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0059493/","name":"Hal Barwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069547/","name":"Jerry Belson"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

The brilliant performances, and complete climax leading to a beautiful ending with such a hopeful message makes this one of my favorites.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194590,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1978-12-25","keywords":"alien,mothership,close encounter of the third kind,single mother,vision","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Close Encounters of the Third Kind","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1849145625","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjA4MDY5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk0NTkyMzI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNjA4MDY5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk0NTkyMzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Re-Release Trailer for Close Encounters of the Third Kind","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000377/","name":"Richard Dreyfuss","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000076/","name":"François Truffaut","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000414/","name":"Teri Garr"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0328941/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103338/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0059493/","name":"Hal Barwood","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069547/","name":"Jerry Belson"],"duration":"PT2H18M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Resident
The Titan
programme.desc: The Resident: Created by Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, Roshan Sethi. With Matt Czuchry, Manish Dayal, Bruce Greenwood, Emily VanCamp. A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6483832/","name":"The Resident","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1MmE1NGYtMzFlYS00YTNmLThjNmEtMjQ5NzY4NmJkZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMzcxOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmrx-242-218325"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Develops well as it continues","reviewBody":"I don't even like medical dramas, and I like this one. Many of the reviews here are from those who only watched the pilot, which I admit showed a rather surface-level power clash of the two main characters. But as the show has gone on (I just finished S1 E6), it has gotten increasingly interesting and much smoother to watch. I mainly started watching because of Matt Cuzchry, and he holds down the cast with a strong performance every episode. I am fascinated with their exploration of corruption in hospitals (although I think it is exaggerated at times, but what drama isn't?!), and they do weave that theme into every episode. \n\nGood overall mix of medical drama, a romance, and individual character stories that have gotten more complex and real. Looking forward to seeing how this plays out!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23659,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,hospital,latex gloves,caucasian","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. programme.title: Free Guy
Free Guy
programme.desc:
Free Guy: Directed by Shawn Levy. With Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Lil Rel Howery, Joe Keery. A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6264654/","name":"Free Guy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY2NzFjODctOWUzMC00MGZhLTlhNjMtM2Y2ODBiNGY1ZWRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6264654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JoelAlexanderr"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"The feel-good film for summer 2021 with a typically hilarious Ryan Reynolds","reviewBody":"One glance at FREE GUY, the newest big budget offering from Hollywood's favorite action-star/comedy master Ryan Reynolds, will cause most to approach with valid skepticism. The plot seems like a cheap knockoff of films like Ready Player One or even The Matrix, but made in a crude fashion to make more money at the box office. The actual movie, however, could not be further from the worst estimates. Not only is FREE GUY constantly hilarious due to Reynolds and an inventive screenplay, and not only is this possibly the feel-good event of the summer, but it also has a considerable amount of thought put into the meaning of its premise and places a mirror in front of modern-day video game culture.

To put it simply, perhaps the main reason this movie comes together so well is because of Ryan Reynolds' constant charisma and hilarity. Most of his dialogue is clearly either written by him or created by him on the spot (I have no idea how he hasn't received a screenwriting credit for this and the Deadpool movies), and the film is that much better as a whole because of it. He also interacts with the other actors in the film very well, including Jodie Comer and Joe Keery, two underrated actors who prove here that they aren't just one-time stars from their respective television shows (Killing Eve and Stranger Things). The ensemble combines to create the most consistently funny movie of 2021 so far.

However, this movie isn't just hilarity and crazy antics, although it could easily get by on those aspects alone. FREE GUY has tons of heart and authenticity despite its virtual reality-based plot, and is about very human emotions such as disillusionment, the feeling of being trapped, and, of course, love. There are times where the heartwarming aspects of this film resemble a charming romantic comedy and others where it gets so existential that it almost feels like The Truman Show. It never dives quite as deep as the latter film, but the fact that it even has the guts to include these themes made this easygoing big-budget movie a far better watch for me. Sure, the last thirty minutes are very cheesy and contain a lot of clichés, but the buildup is so solid that it earns some dumb rom-com moments near the end.

FREE GUY is worth going to see because it is one of the few quality films right now that increases one's faith in human nature. Lately I feel as though I have lost my faith in humanity with all that is happening in the world, so it is refreshing to get a movie that feels confident in the human experience. Maybe I'm looking too deep into the message of FREE GUY and maybe it was conceived just so Ryan Reynolds could screw around for two hours, but either way the price of admission is well worth it for an amazing time at the theater.

A-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":241001,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2021-08-12","keywords":"artificial intelligence,bank robbery,video game world,npc,two word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3038887961","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5NDg2YmMtYjc0Yy00NWRmLWJiYTctNjQ2NzdkODEwMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5NDg2YmMtYjc0Yy00NWRmLWJiYTctNjQ2NzdkODEwMDQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 'Free Guy,' a bank teller who discovers he is actually a background player in an open-world video game, decides to become the hero of his own story...one he rewrites himself. Now in a world where there are no limits, he is determined to be the guy who saves his world his way...before it is too late."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3069650/","name":"Jodie Comer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169806/","name":"Taika Waititi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506613/","name":"Shawn Levy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0781821/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0330789/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1073238/","name":"Matt Lieberman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Martian
Der Marsianer – Rettet Mark Watney
programme.desc: The Martian: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels. An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3659388/","name":"The Martian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MTQ3MDA1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODA3OTI4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3659388/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smart, exciting crowd-pleaser","reviewBody":"Exceptional sci-fi drama from Ridley Scott about an astronaut (Matt Damon) stranded on Mars and the efforts made to rescue him. As others have pointed out, there's more than a little bit here that reminds you of movies like Apollo 13 and Cast Away (particularly the former). I fail to see how that's a knock on it but it's being presented as such by some. We all come to movies with our own expectations and baggage. I'm not a Scott fanboy expecting him to wow me (his last two films were not great). I just wanted to be entertained and this did the trick. It's a movie aimed at the masses that is smarter than your average movie aimed at the masses. Maybe it's not for all nerds (a quick glance at some of the reviews shows a lot of inane nit-picking from people who seem to have no concept of dramatic license), but I didn't find the movie dumbed-down at all. I also want to say how much I appreciated that this managed to stay remarkably light and positive while still maintaining the tension, proving once again that you don't have to be depressing to be good drama. If you haven't seen The Martian yet, you should. It's a great film with a first-rate cast, good direction, and stellar effects. If you're just looking for a quality movie to entertain you for a while, this should be something you'll enjoy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":809330,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-10-07","keywords":"astronaut,space habitat,left for dead,presumed dead,nasa","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi113423129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyOTA4MDQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTg1MDA2NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyOTA4MDQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTg1MDA2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer #2 for The Martian starring Matt Damon."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1567113/","name":"Jessica Chastain"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325419/","name":"Kristen Wiig"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1206844/","name":"Drew Goddard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1083982/","name":"Andy Weir"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3659388, Title: The Martian, --- Description: The Martian: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig, Jeff Daniels. An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3659388/","name":"The Martian","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MTQ3MDA1Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODA3OTI4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3659388/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"utgard14","dateCreated":"2016-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Smart, exciting crowd-pleaser","reviewBody":"Exceptional sci-fi drama from Ridley Scott about an astronaut (Matt Damon) stranded on Mars and the efforts made to rescue him. As others have pointed out, there's more than a little bit here that reminds you of movies like Apollo 13 and Cast Away (particularly the former). I fail to see how that's a knock on it but it's being presented as such by some. We all come to movies with our own expectations and baggage. I'm not a Scott fanboy expecting him to wow me (his last two films were not great). I just wanted to be entertained and this did the trick. It's a movie aimed at the masses that is smarter than your average movie aimed at the masses. Maybe it's not for all nerds (a quick glance at some of the reviews shows a lot of inane nit-picking from people who seem to have no concept of dramatic license), but I didn't find the movie dumbed-down at all. I also want to say how much I appreciated that this managed to stay remarkably light and positive while still maintaining the tension, proving once again that you don't have to be depressing to be good drama. If you haven't seen The Martian yet, you should. It's a great film with a first-rate cast, good direction, and stellar effects. If you're just looking for a quality movie to entertain you for a while, this should be something you'll enjoy.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":809330,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-10-07","keywords":"astronaut,space habitat,left for dead,presumed dead,nasa","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi113423129","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyOTA4MDQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTg1MDA2NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyOTA4MDQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTg1MDA2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official trailer #2 for The Martian starring Matt Damon.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1567113/","name":"Jessica Chastain","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1325419/","name":"Kristen Wiig"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0420822/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1206844/","name":"Drew Goddard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1083982/","name":"Andy Weir"],"duration":"PT2H24M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Resident
The Titan
programme.desc: The Resident: Created by Amy Holden Jones, Hayley Schore, Roshan Sethi. With Matt Czuchry, Manish Dayal, Bruce Greenwood, Emily VanCamp. A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6483832/","name":"The Resident","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc1MmE1NGYtMzFlYS00YTNmLThjNmEtMjQ5NzY4NmJkZTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMzcxOTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of doctors at Chastain Memorial Hospital face personal and professional challenges on a daily basis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6483832/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmrx-242-218325"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Develops well as it continues","reviewBody":"I don't even like medical dramas, and I like this one. Many of the reviews here are from those who only watched the pilot, which I admit showed a rather surface-level power clash of the two main characters. But as the show has gone on (I just finished S1 E6), it has gotten increasingly interesting and much smoother to watch. I mainly started watching because of Matt Cuzchry, and he holds down the cast with a strong performance every episode. I am fascinated with their exploration of corruption in hospitals (although I think it is exaggerated at times, but what drama isn't?!), and they do weave that theme into every episode. \n\nGood overall mix of medical drama, a romance, and individual character stories that have gotten more complex and real. Looking forward to seeing how this plays out!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23659,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-21","keywords":"two word title,atlanta georgia,hospital,latex gloves,caucasian","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0194516/","name":"Matt Czuchry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2110485/","name":"Manish Dayal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339304/","name":"Bruce Greenwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0683032/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427468/","name":"Amy Holden Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2735698/","name":"Hayley Schore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6149734/","name":"Roshan Sethi"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 1 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi528529689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2RjODYyNTMtZTljZC00ZmViLWEzZmYtZjExNmM2Y2I2MTQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":""The Resident" follows Dr. Conrad Hawkins, one of the best doctors at Chastain Park Memorial Hospital. Charming, arrogant and only a third-year resident, Conrad does everything in the most unconventional way possible."}}</script><metacontent="

The problem is that It doesn't really know how to end or how to go along after a certain point. It premise is its best quality. At the end of the day more complicated doesn't always mean better.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8088,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-08-10","keywords":"older man younger woman marriage,scientist,cloning,large estate,non linear","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Elizabeth Harvest","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1092074265","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ5MDUyNmYtM2Y5Yy00NTdjLWJmMTQtMWJhNDFjMGRjZTk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ5MDUyNmYtM2Y5Yy00NTdjLWJmMTQtMWJhNDFjMGRjZTk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3880181/","name":"Abbey Lee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001354/","name":"Ciarán Hinds","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001303/","name":"Carla Gugino"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349406/","name":"Sebastian Gutierrez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0743279/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323227/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014956/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349406/","name":"Sebastian Gutierrez"],"duration":"PT1H48M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Unknown
Unknown Identity
programme.desc: Unknown: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra. With Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones, Aidan Quinn. When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1401152/","name":"Unknown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA4NTk3MTQwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjUwMTMxNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1401152/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"uorrett"},"dateCreated":"2011-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Keeps your attention","reviewBody":"Anyone who has watched Liam Neeson's movies have grown accustom to a character that is always thrown into absurd situations but can still somehow use wit, power and skills to get himself out. Unknown offers the same formula but it still works. This movie caught my attention from the get go. I enjoy how Liam is believable in these roles and you forget that he's getting up there in age, if anything, he makes it seem like this is what any man his age is capable of. He is awaken from a coma to discover that his identity has been taken by someone else. Worst yet, his wife doesn't seem to recognize him. With the help of the woman that saved his life, in a country that is not his home, Liam seeks about to prove himself. This movie is action packed and keeps you on the edge while you try to figure out what is going on. And I feel the ending does not disappoint. Enjoyable, entertaining, action packed and thrilling!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256985,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-03-23","keywords":"amnesia,coma,airport,scientist,nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unknown: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1552980505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005064/","name":"January Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429471/","name":"Jaume Collet-Serra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124700/","name":"Oliver Butcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180508/","name":"Stephen Cornwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885857/","name":"Didier Van Cauwelaert"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="
